alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 15 at 9:31AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. .With recent heavy rainfall, area rivers are expected to reach minor flood stage in the coming days. For the Peace...including Bartow, Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...From Friday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The Girl Scout camp floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to 12.2 feet early Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.2 feet on 09/29/1954. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 9.5 Thu 8 am 10.5 11.4 11.9 12.2 12.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1245 AM EDT.
